original_text: The person must kill the young bull in front of the Lord. The priests who are the sons of Aaron will take the blood. They will throw it onto the sides of the altar. That is the altar near to the door of the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 그는 여호와 앞에서 그 수송아지를 잡을 것이요 아론의 자손 제사장들은 그 피를 가져다가 회막 문 앞 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: The person must kill the young bull
The priests who are the sons of Aaron
They will throw it onto the sides of the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것을 제단의 옆면에 던질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: near to the door of the Tent of Meeting
